articles.title: –¢—É—Ä–µ—Ü—å–∫–∞ –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª—å–Ω–∞ –ª–µ–∫—Å–∏–∫–∞: —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞ —Ç–∞ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑–∏ –¥–ª—è –æ—Å–æ–±–ª–∏–≤–æ–≥–æ –¥–Ω—è
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';

# –¢—É—Ä–µ—Ü—å–∫–∞ –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª—å–Ω–∞ –ª–µ–∫—Å–∏–∫–∞: —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞ —Ç–∞ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑–∏ –¥–ª—è –æ—Å–æ–±–ª–∏–≤–æ–≥–æ –¥–Ω—è

–í–µ—Å—ñ–ª–ª—è ‚Äî —Ü–µ –æ–¥–∏–Ω —ñ–∑ –Ω–∞–π–≤–∞–∂–ª–∏–≤—ñ—à–∏—Ö –¥–Ω—ñ–≤ —É –∂–∏—Ç—Ç—ñ –ø–∞—Ä–∏. –Ø–∫—â–æ –≤–∏ –ø–ª–∞–Ω—É—î—Ç–µ –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª–ª—è –∑–∞ –∫–æ—Ä–¥–æ–Ω–æ–º, –≤–∞—à –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω–µ—Ä —Ä–æ–∑–º–æ–≤–ª—è—î —Ç—É—Ä–µ—Ü—å–∫–æ—é, –∞–±–æ –≤–∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ —Ö–æ—á–µ—Ç–µ –ø—Ä–∏–≤—ñ—Ç–∞—Ç–∏ –∫–æ–≥–æ—Å—å –æ—Å–æ–±–ª–∏–≤–∏–º–∏ —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞–º–∏ ‚Äî —Ü—è —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—Ç—è –¥–ª—è –≤–∞—Å!

–¢—É—Ç –≤–∏ –∑–Ω–∞–π–¥–µ—Ç–µ –Ω–∞–π–≤–∞–∂–ª–∏–≤—ñ—à—É —Ç—É—Ä–µ—Ü—å–∫–∞—É –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª—å–Ω—É –ª–µ–∫—Å–∏–∫—É: –≤—ñ–¥ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–∏—Ö —Å–ª—ñ–≤ –¥–æ —Ç—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü—ñ–π–Ω–∏—Ö —Ç–æ—Å—Ç—ñ–≤ —Ç–∞ –ø—Ä–∏–≤—ñ—Ç–∞–Ω—å.

<PhraseOfDay
  phrase="Tebrikler!"
  translation="–í—ñ—Ç–∞—é!"
  context="–¢—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü—ñ–π–Ω–µ –ø—Ä–∏–≤—ñ—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—è –º–æ–ª–æ–¥—è—Ç"
/>

## –û—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–∞ –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª—å–Ω–∞ –ª–µ–∫—Å–∏–∫–∞

–ü–æ—á–Ω–µ–º–æ –∑ –Ω–∞–π–≤–∞–∂–ª–∏–≤—ñ—à–∏—Ö —Å–ª—ñ–≤, —è–∫—ñ –≤–∞–º –∑–Ω–∞–¥–æ–±–ª—è—Ç—å—Å—è:


<VocabCard 
  word="d√ºƒü√ºn"
  translation="–≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª–ª—è"
  pronunciation="/dyÀàyn/"
  example="D√ºƒü√ºn√ºm√ºz haziranda olacak."
  exampleTranslation="–ù–∞—à–µ –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª–ª—è –±—É–¥–µ —É —á–µ—Ä–≤–Ω—ñ."
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="gelin"
  translation="–Ω–∞—Ä–µ—á–µ–Ω–∞"
  pronunciation="/…°eÀàlin/"
  example="Gelin √ßok g√ºzel g√∂r√ºn√ºyor."
  exampleTranslation="–ù–∞—Ä–µ—á–µ–Ω–∞ –≤–∏–≥–ª—è–¥–∞—î —á—É–¥–æ–≤–æ."
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="damat"
  translation="–Ω–∞—Ä–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–π"
  pronunciation="/daÀàmat/"
  example="Damat sunakta bekliyor."
  exampleTranslation="–ù–∞—Ä–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–π —á–µ–∫–∞—î –±—ñ–ª—è –≤—ñ–≤—Ç–∞—Ä—è."
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="yeminler"
  translation="–∫–ª—è—Ç–≤–∏ / –æ–±—ñ—Ç–Ω–∏—Ü—ñ"
  pronunciation="/jeÀàminler/"
  example="Kendi yeminlerini yazdƒ±lar."
  exampleTranslation="–í–æ–Ω–∏ –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–ª–∏ –≤–ª–∞—Å–Ω—ñ –∫–ª—è—Ç–≤–∏."
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="Evet, kabul ediyorum"
  translation="–¢–∞–∫, –∑–≥–æ–¥–µ–Ω/–∑–≥–æ–¥–Ω–∞"
  pronunciation="/eÀàvet kaÀàbul ediÀàj…îrum/"
  example=""Evet" dediƒüinde evlisiniz."
  exampleTranslation="–ö–æ–ª–∏ –≤–∏ –≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–µ "Evet", –≤–∏ –æ–¥—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω—ñ."
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="alyans"
  translation="–æ–±—Ä—É—á–∫–∞"
  pronunciation="/alÀàjans/"
  example="Alyansƒ± parmaƒüƒ±na taktƒ±."
  exampleTranslation="–í—ñ–Ω –Ω–∞–¥—ñ–≤ –æ–±—Ä—É—á–∫—É –Ω–∞ —ó—ó –ø–∞–ª–µ—Ü—å."
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="t√∂ren"
  translation="—Ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–æ–Ω—ñ—è"
  pronunciation="/t√∏Àà…æen/"
  example="T√∂ren √ßok duygu doluydu."
  exampleTranslation="–¶–µ—Ä–µ–º–æ–Ω—ñ—è –±—É–ª–∞ –¥—É–∂–µ –∑–≤–æ—Ä—É—à–ª–∏–≤–æ—é."
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="resepsiyon"
  translation="–±–∞–Ω–∫–µ—Ç / –ø—Ä–∏–π–æ–º"
  pronunciation="/…æesepsiÀàjon/"
  example="Resepsiyon saat 19'da."
  exampleTranslation="–ë–∞–Ω–∫–µ—Ç –æ 19:00."
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="saƒüdƒ±√ß"
  translation="—Å–≤—ñ–¥–æ–∫ (–Ω–∞—Ä–µ—á–µ–Ω–æ–≥–æ)"
  pronunciation="/saÀêÀàd…®t É/"
  example="Karde≈üim saƒüdƒ±cƒ±m olacak."
  exampleTranslation="–ú—ñ–π –±—Ä–∞—Ç –±—É–¥–µ —Å–≤—ñ–¥–∫–æ–º."
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="nedime"
  translation="–¥—Ä—É–∂–∫–∞"
  pronunciation="/nediÀàme/"
  example="Kƒ±z karde≈üi nedime."
  exampleTranslation="–á—ó —Å–µ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞ –±—É–¥–µ –¥—Ä—É–∂–∫–æ—é."
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="kadeh kaldƒ±rmak"
  translation="–ø—ñ–¥–Ω—è—Ç–∏ —Ç–æ—Å—Ç"
  pronunciation="/kaÀàdeh kald…®…æÀàmak/"
  example="Mutlu √ßift i√ßin kadeh kaldƒ±ralƒ±m!"
  exampleTranslation="–î–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—å—Ç–µ –ø—ñ–¥–Ω—è—Ç–∏ —Ç–æ—Å—Ç –∑–∞ –º–æ–ª–æ–¥—è—Ç!"
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="Tebrikler!"
  translation="–í—ñ—Ç–∞—é!"
  pronunciation="/teb…æikÀàler/"
  example="D√ºƒü√ºn√ºn√ºz kutlu olsun!"
  exampleTranslation="–í—ñ—Ç–∞—é –∑ –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª–ª—è–º!"
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="yeni evliler"
  translation="–º–æ–ª–æ–¥—è—Ç–∞"
  pronunciation="/jeÀàni evliÀàler/"
  example="Yeni evliler balayƒ±na gitti."
  exampleTranslation="–ú–æ–ª–æ–¥—è—Ç–∞ –ø–æ—ó—Ö–∞–ª–∏ —É –º–µ–¥–æ–≤–∏–π –º—ñ—Å—è—Ü—å."
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="gelinlik"
  translation="–≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª—å–Ω–∞ —Å—É–∫–Ω—è"
  pronunciation="/…°elinÀàlik/"
  example="G√ºzel bir gelinlik se√ßti."
  exampleTranslation="–í–æ–Ω–∞ –æ–±—Ä–∞–ª–∞ —á—É–¥–æ–≤—É –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª—å–Ω—É —Å—É–∫–Ω—é."
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="buket"
  translation="–±—É–∫–µ—Ç"
  pronunciation="/buÀàket/"
  example="Gelin buketi fƒ±rlattƒ±."
  exampleTranslation="–ù–∞—Ä–µ—á–µ–Ω–∞ –∫–∏–Ω—É–ª–∞ –±—É–∫–µ—Ç."
/>


## –¢—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü—ñ–π–Ω—ñ –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª—å–Ω—ñ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑–∏

### –ü—Ä–∏–≤—ñ—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—è –º–æ–ª–æ–¥—è—Ç

–ù–∞ –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª–ª—ñ –ø—Ä–∏–π–Ω—è—Ç–æ –≤—ñ—Ç–∞—Ç–∏ –º–æ–ª–æ–¥—è—Ç. –û—Å—å –∫—ñ–ª—å–∫–∞ –∫–æ—Ä–∏—Å–Ω–∏—Ö —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑ —Ç—É—Ä–µ—Ü—å–∫–æ—é:

| –¢—É—Ä–µ—Ü—å–∫–∞ | –£–∫—Ä–∞—ó–Ω—Å—å–∫–∞ |
|----------------|------------|
| Tebrikler! | –í—ñ—Ç–∞—é! |
| kadeh kaldƒ±rmak | –¢–æ—Å—Ç! |

<CultureTip>
–í–µ—Å—ñ–ª—å–Ω—ñ —Ç—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü—ñ—ó –≤—ñ–¥—Ä—ñ–∑–Ω—è—é—Ç—å—Å—è –≤ —Ä—ñ–∑–Ω–∏—Ö –∫—É–ª—å—Ç—É—Ä–∞—Ö. –ù–∞–ø—Ä–∏–∫–ª–∞–¥, —Ç—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü—ñ–π–Ω–∞ —Ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–æ–Ω—ñ—è —Ç—É—Ä–µ—Ü—å–∫–æ—é –º–æ–∂–µ –≤–∫–ª—é—á–∞—Ç–∏ —É–Ω—ñ–∫–∞–ª—å–Ω—ñ —Ä–∏—Ç—É–∞–ª–∏ —Ç–∞ –∑–≤–∏—á–∞—ó, —è–∫—ñ –≤–∞—Ä—Ç–æ –∑–Ω–∞—Ç–∏ –∑–∞–∑–¥–∞–ª–µ–≥—ñ–¥—å.
</CultureTip>

## –û—Ä–≥–∞–Ω—ñ–∑–∞—Ü—ñ—è –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª–ª—è

–Ø–∫—â–æ –≤–∏ –ø–ª–∞–Ω—É—î—Ç–µ –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª–ª—è –∑ –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–º, —è–∫–∏–π —Ä–æ–∑–º–æ–≤–ª—è—î —Ç—É—Ä–µ—Ü—å–∫–æ—é, –≤–∞–º –∑–Ω–∞–¥–æ–±–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –ª–µ–∫—Å–∏–∫–∞ –¥–ª—è –æ–±–≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω—è –¥–µ—Ç–∞–ª–µ–π:

### –ú—ñ—Å—Ü–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–Ω—è
- –¶–µ—Ä–∫–≤–∞ / –•—Ä–∞–º
- –†–µ—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∞–Ω
- –ì–æ—Ç–µ–ª—å
- –ù–∞ –≤—ñ–¥–∫—Ä–∏—Ç–æ–º—É –ø–æ–≤—ñ—Ç—Ä—ñ

### –í–∞–∂–ª–∏–≤—ñ –¥–µ—Ç–∞–ª—ñ
- –ó–∞–ø—Ä–æ—à–µ–Ω–Ω—è –≥–æ—Å—Ç–µ–π
- –í–∏–±—ñ—Ä –¥–∞—Ç–∏
- –î—Ä–µ—Å-–∫–æ–¥
- –ú–µ–Ω—é

## –í–µ—Å—ñ–ª—å–Ω—ñ —Ç–æ—Å—Ç–∏

–¢—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü—ñ–π–Ω–∏–π —Ç–æ—Å—Ç —Ç—É—Ä–µ—Ü—å–∫–æ—é ‚Äî —Ü–µ —Ü—ñ–ª–µ –º–∏—Å—Ç–µ—Ü—Ç–≤–æ! –û—Å—å –∫—ñ–ª—å–∫–∞ –ø–æ—Ä–∞–¥:

1. **–ü–æ—á–Ω—ñ—Ç—å –∑ –ø—Ä–∏–≤—ñ—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—è** ‚Äî –∑–≤–µ—Ä–Ω—ñ—Ç—å—Å—è –¥–æ –º–æ–ª–æ–¥—è—Ç —Ç–∞ –≥–æ—Å—Ç–µ–π
2. **–ü–æ–¥—ñ–ª—ñ—Ç—å—Å—è —ñ—Å—Ç–æ—Ä—ñ—î—é** ‚Äî —Ä–æ–∑–∫–∞–∂—ñ—Ç—å —â–æ—Å—å –æ—Å–æ–±–∏—Å—Ç–µ –ø—Ä–æ –ø–∞—Ä—É
3. **–ü–æ–±–∞–∂–∞–π—Ç–µ —â–∞—Å—Ç—è** ‚Äî –∑–∞–≤–µ—Ä—à—ñ—Ç—å —Ç–µ–ø–ª–∏–º–∏ –ø–æ–±–∞–∂–∞–Ω–Ω—è–º–∏
4. **–ü—ñ–¥–Ω—ñ–º—ñ—Ç—å –∫–µ–ª–∏—Ö** ‚Äî —Ç—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü—ñ–π–Ω–æ –∫–∞–∂—É—Ç—å —Ç–æ—Å—Ç –ø–µ—Ä–µ–¥ —Ç–∏–º, —è–∫ –≤–∏–ø–∏—Ç–∏

<CultureTip>
–£ –±–∞–≥–∞—Ç—å–æ—Ö –∫—É–ª—å—Ç—É—Ä–∞—Ö —Ç–æ—Å—Ç —Å—É–ø—Ä–æ–≤–æ–¥–∂—É—î—Ç—å—Å—è –æ—Å–æ–±–ª–∏–≤–∏–º–∏ —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞–º–∏. –î—ñ–∑–Ω–∞–π—Ç–µ—Å—è –∑–∞–∑–¥–∞–ª–µ–≥—ñ–¥—å, —è–∫—ñ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑–∏ –ø—Ä–∏–π–Ω—è—Ç—ñ –Ω–∞ –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª–ª—ñ —Ç—É—Ä–µ—Ü—å–∫–æ—é.
</CultureTip>

## –í–µ—Å—ñ–ª—å–Ω—ñ –æ–±—ñ—Ç–Ω–∏—Ü—ñ

–Ø–∫—â–æ –≤–∏ –ø–ª–∞–Ω—É—î—Ç–µ –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞—Ç–∏ –≤–ª–∞—Å–Ω—ñ –æ–±—ñ—Ç–Ω–∏—Ü—ñ —Ç—É—Ä–µ—Ü—å–∫–æ—é, –æ—Å—å –∫–æ—Ä–∏—Å–Ω–∞ —Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∞:

1. –ó–≤–µ—Ä–Ω–µ–Ω–Ω—è –¥–æ –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω–µ—Ä–∞
2. –ß–æ–º—É –≤–∏ –π–æ–≥–æ/—ó—ó –∫–æ—Ö–∞—î—Ç–µ
3. –í–∞—à—ñ –æ–±—ñ—Ü—è–Ω–∫–∏ –Ω–∞ –º–∞–π–±—É—Ç–Ω—î
4. –ó–∞–≤–µ—Ä—à–∞–ª—å–Ω—ñ —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞ –ª—é–±–æ–≤—ñ

## –ö–æ—Ä–∏—Å–Ω—ñ –≤–∏—Ä–∞–∑–∏ –¥–ª—è –≥–æ—Å—Ç–µ–π

–Ø–∫—â–æ –≤–∞—Å –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å–∏–ª–∏ –Ω–∞ –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª–ª—è, –¥–µ —Ä–æ–∑–º–æ–≤–ª—è—é—Ç—å —Ç—É—Ä–µ—Ü—å–∫–æ—é, –∑–∞–ø–∞–º'—è—Ç–∞–π—Ç–µ —Ü—ñ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑–∏:

- –Ø–∫ –ø—Ä–∏–≤—ñ—Ç–∞—Ç–∏ –º–æ–ª–æ–¥—è—Ç
- –Ø–∫ –≤—ñ–¥–ø–æ–≤—ñ—Å—Ç–∏ –Ω–∞ –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—à–µ–Ω–Ω—è
- –Ø–∫ –ø–æ–¥—è–∫—É–≤–∞—Ç–∏ –∑–∞ –≥–æ—Å—Ç–∏–Ω–Ω—ñ—Å—Ç—å

## –ü–æ–¥–∞–ª—å—à–µ –≤–∏–≤—á–µ–Ω–Ω—è

–¢–µ–ø–µ—Ä –≤–∏ –∑–Ω–∞—î—Ç–µ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—É –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª—å–Ω—É –ª–µ–∫—Å–∏–∫—É —Ç—É—Ä–µ—Ü—å–∫–æ—é! –ü—Ä–æ–¥–æ–≤–∂—É–π—Ç–µ –≤–∏–≤—á–∞—Ç–∏ –º–æ–≤—É –∑—ñ —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—Ç—è–º–∏:

- [–¢—É—Ä–µ—Ü—å–∫–∞ —Ä–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–Ω—ñ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑–∏ –¥–ª—è –ø–∞—Ä](/uk/blog/turkish-romantic-phrases-for-couples)
- [–Ø–∫ —Å–∫–∞–∑–∞—Ç–∏ "–Ø —Ç–µ–±–µ –∫–æ—Ö–∞—é" —Ç—É—Ä–µ—Ü—å–∫–æ—é](/uk/blog/how-to-say-i-love-you-in-turkish)

<CTA 
  text="–•–æ—á–µ—Ç–µ –≤–∏–≤—á–∏—Ç–∏ –±—ñ–ª—å—à–µ —Ç—É—Ä–µ—Ü—å–∫—ñ–∏—Ö —Å–ª—ñ–≤ –¥–ª—è —Å—Ç–æ—Å—É–Ω–∫—ñ–≤? –°–ø—Ä–æ–±—É–π—Ç–µ –Ω–∞—à –¥–æ–¥–∞—Ç–æ–∫!"
  buttonText="–ü–æ—á–∞—Ç–∏ –≤–∏–≤—á–µ–Ω–Ω—è"
  href="/uk/learn/tr"
/>

articles.title: Rom√°n esk√ºv≈ëi kifejez√©sek: Sz√≥kincs a nagy napra
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

A p√°rod esk√ºv≈ëi napja az √©letetek egyik legfontosabb pillanata. Ha rom√°nul tudsz kifejezni magad a szertart√°s, a k√∂sz√∂nt≈ëk √©s az √ºnnepl√©s sor√°n, ez a k√ºl√∂nleges nap m√©g eml√©kezetesebb√© v√°lik. Ak√°r rom√°n nyelvter√ºleten h√°zasodtok, ak√°r tisztelegni szeretn√©l a p√°rod √∂r√∂ks√©ge el≈ëtt, ezek a kifejez√©sek seg√≠tenek.

Ha m√©g az alapokat tanulod, n√©zd meg a [Hogyan mondd: Szeretlek rom√°nul](/learn/hu/ro/romanian-how-to-say-i-love-you) √∫tmutat√≥nkat.

<PhraseOfDay
  word="FelicitƒÉri!"
  translation="Gratul√°lok!"
  pronunciation="felitÕ° ÉiÀàt…ôr"
  context="Az esk√ºv≈ëi k√∂sz√∂nt√©s alapja."
/>

## Alapvet≈ë sz√≥kincs

Kezdj√ºk az alapvet≈ë esk√ºv≈ëi sz√≥kinccsel, amivel minden rom√°n esk√ºv≈ën tal√°lkozni fogsz:

<VocabCard
  word="nuntƒÉ"
  translation="esk√ºv≈ë"
  pronunciation="Àànunt…ô"
  example="Nunta a fost frumoasƒÉ."
/>

| Rom√°n | Magyar | Haszn√°lat |
|---|---|---|
| mireasƒÉ | menyasszony | A n≈ë |
| mire | v≈ëleg√©ny | A f√©rfi |
| jurƒÉminte | fogadalmak | Esk√ºv≈ëi √≠g√©retek |
| ceremonie | szertart√°s | A hivatalos r√©sz |
| recep»õie | fogad√°s | Az √ºnnepl√©s |
| toast | k√∂sz√∂nt≈ë | Poh√°rk√∂sz√∂nt≈ë |

<CultureTip flag="üåç" title="Rom√°n kultur√°lis tippek">
A rom√°n esk√ºv≈ëk gyakran tartalmaznak egyedi kultur√°lis hagyom√°nyokat, amelyeket gener√°ci√≥k √≥ta ≈ëriznek. Ezen szok√°sok meg√©rt√©se seg√≠t, hogy teljes m√©rt√©kben r√©szt vegy√©l az √ºnnepl√©sen √©s tiszteletet mutass a p√°rod √∂r√∂ks√©ge ir√°nt.
</CultureTip>

## Hasznos kifejez√©sek

### Gratul√°ci√≥k √©s j√≥k√≠v√°ns√°gok

Amikor gratul√°lsz a boldog p√°rnak, ezek a kifejez√©sek seg√≠tenek:

- **FelicitƒÉri!** - Gratul√°lok!
- **Sok boldogs√°got k√≠v√°nok!** - Hagyom√°nyos j√≥k√≠v√°ns√°g
- **Legyetek boldogok!** - Egyszer≈±, sz√≠vb≈ël j√∂v≈ë k√≠v√°ns√°g

### K√∂sz√∂nt≈ëk
A poh√°rk√∂sz√∂nt≈ë fontos r√©sze az esk√ºv≈ënek:

- **Emeljen poharat!** - Felh√≠v√°s a k√∂sz√∂nt≈ëre
- **A boldog p√°rra!** - Egyszer≈± k√∂sz√∂nt≈ë
- **A szerelemre!** - Romantikus k√∂sz√∂nt≈ë

<VocabCard
  word="luna de miere"
  translation="n√°sz√∫t"
  pronunciation="luna de Ààmjere"
  example="Au plecat √Æn luna de miere."
/>

## Gyakorlati helyzetek

| Helyzet | Mit mondj |
|---|---|
| Gratul√°l√°s | Haszn√°ld a k√∂sz√∂nt√©si kifejez√©seket |
| K√∂sz√∂nt≈ë | Emeld a poharat √©s mondj p√°r sz√©p sz√≥t |
| T√°ncra k√©r√©s | K√©rd fel a p√°rod udvariasan |
| B√∫cs√∫z√°s | K√≠v√°nj sok boldogs√°got |

<CultureTip flag="üí°" title="Hasznos tipp">
Gyakorold a kiejt√©st a nagy nap el≈ëtt. Nem baj, ha nem besz√©lsz t√∂k√©letesen - a p√°rod √©s csal√°dja √©rt√©kelni fogja az er≈ëfesz√≠t√©st.
</CultureTip>

## √ñsszefoglal√≥ t√°bl√°zat

| Helyzet | Rom√°n kifejez√©s |
|---|---|
| Gratul√°ci√≥ | FelicitƒÉri! |
| Az esem√©ny | nuntƒÉ |
| A n≈ë | mireasƒÉ |
| A f√©rfi | mire |
| Esk√ºv≈ëi √≠g√©retek | jurƒÉminte |

## Tov√°bbi tanul√°s

Ha tov√°bb szeretn√©d fejleszteni a rom√°n nyelvtud√°sod, n√©zd meg ezeket a cikkeinket:

- [Rom√°n romantikus kifejez√©sek minden alkalomra](/learn/hu/ro/romanian-romantic-phrases-for-every-occasion)
- [Hogyan mondd: Szeretlek rom√°nul](/learn/hu/ro/romanian-how-to-say-i-love-you)
- [Rom√°n alapvet≈ë kifejez√©sek p√°roknak](/learn/hu/ro/romanian-essential-phrases-for-couples)

Ezek a forr√°sok seg√≠tenek elm√©ly√≠teni a tud√°sod √©s magabiztosabb√° v√°lni a rom√°n nyelvben.

<CTA />

articles.title: De Familie Ontmoeten: Essenti√´le Roemeense Zinnen
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import ConjugationTable from '@components/ConjugationTable.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

De Roemeense schoonfamilie ontmoeten? Familie is ontzettend belangrijk in de Roemeense cultuur! Met de juiste zinnen en cultureel begrip maak je zeker een geweldige indruk.

## De Eerste Ontmoeting

<PhraseOfDay
  word="√émi pare bine sƒÉ vƒÉ cunosc"
  translation="Het doet me genoegen u te ontmoeten"
  pronunciation="…®mee PA-reh BEE-neh s…ô v…ô koo-NOSK"
  context="De formele manier om je voor te stellen bij de ouders!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="BunƒÉ ziua, mƒÉ numesc..."
  translation="Goedendag, mijn naam is..."
  pronunciation="BOO-n…ô ZEE-wa m…ô noo-MESK"
  example="BunƒÉ ziua, mƒÉ numesc Jan. √émi pare bine sƒÉ vƒÉ cunosc!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Am auzit multe despre dumneavoastrƒÉ"
  translation="Ik heb veel over u gehoord"
  pronunciation="am au-ZEET MOOL-teh DES-preh doom-nea-VOAS-tr…ô"
  example="√émi pare bine! Am auzit multe despre dumneavoastrƒÉ."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="[Partner] mi-a povestit mult despre dumneavoastrƒÉ"
  translation="[Partner] heeft veel over u verteld"
  pronunciation="mee-a po-ves-TEET moolt DES-preh doom-nea-VOAS-tr…ô"
  example="Ana mi-a povestit mult despre dumneavoastrƒÉ. Numai lucruri frumoase!"
/>

<CultureTip title="DumneavoastrƒÉ vs. Tu" flag="üá∑üá¥">
Gebruik ALTIJD "dumneavoastrƒÉ" (u) bij de ouders van je partner! Dit toont respect. Ze zullen je uitnodigen om "tu" (je) te gebruiken als ze er klaar voor zijn.
</CultureTip>

## Jezelf Voorstellen

<VocabCard
  word="Sunt din Olanda"
  translation="Ik kom uit Nederland"
  pronunciation="soont deen o-LAN-da"
  example="Sunt din Olanda, din Amsterdam."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Lucrez ca..."
  translation="Ik werk als..."
  pronunciation="loo-KREZ ka"
  example="Lucrez ca inginer la o companie de tehnologie."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Ne-am cunoscut la/√Æn..."
  translation="Wij hebben elkaar leren kennen op/in..."
  pronunciation="ne-am koo-nos-KOOT la/…®n"
  example="Ne-am cunoscut la serviciu acum doi ani."
/>

| Situatie | Roemeens | Nederlands |
|----------|----------|------------|
| Op het werk | la serviciu | op het werk |
| Op de universiteit | la universitate | op de universiteit |
| Via vrienden | prin prieteni | via vrienden |
| Online | pe internet | online |
| Op reis | √Æn cƒÉlƒÉtorie | op reis |

## Familieleden Benoemen

<VocabCard
  word="soacrƒÉ"
  translation="schoonmoeder"
  pronunciation="SOA-kr…ô"
  example="Soacra mea este foarte drƒÉgu»õƒÉ."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="socru"
  translation="schoonvader"
  pronunciation="SO-kroo"
  example="Socrul meu gƒÉte»ôte fantastic."
/>

| Roemeens | Nederlands |
|----------|------------|
| soacrƒÉ | schoonmoeder |
| socru | schoonvader |
| norƒÉ | schoondochter |
| ginere | schoonzoon |
| cumnat | zwager |
| cumnatƒÉ | schoonzus |
| socrii | schoonouders |

<CultureTip title="Bunica en Bunicul" flag="üëµüë¥">
Grootouders (bunica/bunicul) zijn heel belangrijk in Roemeense families. Geef ze extra respect en aandacht!
</CultureTip>

## Beleefde Gespreksstarters

<VocabCard
  word="Ce mai face»õi?"
  translation="Hoe gaat het met u?"
  pronunciation="cheh mai fa-CHETS"
  example="BunƒÉ ziua! Ce mai face»õi?"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Ave»õi o casƒÉ frumoasƒÉ"
  translation="U heeft een mooi huis"
  pronunciation="a-VETS o KA-s…ô froo-MOA-s…ô"
  example="Ave»õi o casƒÉ frumoasƒÉ! Foarte primitoare."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Ce grƒÉdinƒÉ minunatƒÉ"
  translation="Wat een prachtige tuin"
  pronunciation="cheh gr…ô-DEE-n…ô mee-noo-NA-t…ô"
  example="Ce grƒÉdinƒÉ minunatƒÉ! O √Ængriji»õi singuri?"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Pot sƒÉ vƒÉ ajut cu ceva?"
  translation="Kan ik u ergens mee helpen?"
  pronunciation="pot s…ô v…ô a-DJOOT koo CHEH-va"
  example="Ce miros delicios! Pot sƒÉ vƒÉ ajut cu ceva?"
/>

## Aan Tafel

<VocabCard
  word="AratƒÉ delicios!"
  translation="Dit ziet er heerlijk uit!"
  pronunciation="a-RA-t…ô deh-lee-chee-OS"
  example="Oh, aratƒÉ delicios! Mul»õumesc pentru invita»õie."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Este foarte gustos"
  translation="Het is heel lekker"
  pronunciation="YES-teh FOAR-teh goos-TOS"
  example="Este foarte gustos! GƒÉti»õi minunat!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Mai pot, vƒÉ rog?"
  translation="Mag ik nog, alstublieft?"
  pronunciation="mai pot v…ô rog"
  example="At√¢t de gustos! Mai pot, vƒÉ rog?"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="PoftƒÉ bunƒÉ!"
  translation="Eet smakelijk!"
  pronunciation="POF-t…ô BOO-n…ô"
  example="PoftƒÉ bunƒÉ tuturor!"
/>

<CultureTip title="»öuicƒÉ" flag="ü•É">
Als je »õuicƒÉ (Roemeense pruimenbrandewijn) krijgt aangeboden, neem het aan! Het is een teken van gastvrijheid. Zeg "Noroc!" (Proost!) bij het toasten.
</CultureTip>

## Complimenten Geven

<VocabCard
  word="GƒÉti»õi extraordinar"
  translation="U kookt buitengewoon"
  pronunciation="g…ô-TEETS eks-tra-or-dee-NAR"
  example="GƒÉti»õi extraordinar, doamna Popescu!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Ave»õi un gust rafinat"
  translation="U heeft een verfijnde smaak"
  pronunciation="a-VETS oon goost ra-fee-NAT"
  example="Ave»õi un gust rafinat √Æn amenajare!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="[Partner] are noroc cu o familie a»ôa"
  translation="[Partner] heeft geluk met zo'n familie"
  pronunciation="A-reh no-ROK koo o fa-MEE-lee-eh a-SHA"
  example="Ana are noroc cu o familie at√¢t de minunatƒÉ."
/>

## Interesse Tonen

<VocabCard
  word="Povesti»õi-mi mai mult"
  translation="Vertel me meer"
  pronunciation="po-ves-TEETS-mee mai moolt"
  example="Ce interesant! Povesti»õi-mi mai mult."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Cum v-a»õi cunoscut?"
  translation="Hoe hebben u elkaar leren kennen?"
  pronunciation="koom vats koo-nos-KOOT"
  example="Pot sƒÉ √Æntreb cum v-a»õi cunoscut?"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Este foarte interesant"
  translation="Dat is heel interessant"
  pronunciation="YES-teh FOAR-teh in-teh-reh-SANT"
  example="Este foarte interesant. Mai lucra»õi?"
/>

## Cadeaus Geven

<VocabCard
  word="Am adus asta pentru dumneavoastrƒÉ"
  translation="Ik heb dit voor u meegebracht"
  pronunciation="am a-DOOS AS-ta PEN-troo doom-nea-VOAS-tr…ô"
  example="Am adus asta pentru dumneavoastrƒÉ. Sper sƒÉ vƒÉ placƒÉ."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Un mic cadou din Olanda"
  translation="Een klein cadeautje uit Nederland"
  pronunciation="oon meek ka-DOU deen o-LAN-da"
  example="Pofti»õi, un mic cadou din Olanda."
/>

### Cadeau-idee√´n voor Roemeense Schoonfamilies

| Cadeau | Roemeens | Waarom Geschikt |
|--------|----------|-----------------|
| Bloemen | flori | Altijd gewaardeerd |
| Wijn | vin | Klassieke keuze |
| Chocolade | ciocolatƒÉ | Iedereen houdt ervan |
| Nederlandse kaas | br√¢nzƒÉ olandezƒÉ | Typisch Nederlands |
| Stroopwafels | stroopwafel | Uniek en lekker |

<CultureTip title="Bloemen" flag="üíê">
Neem een oneven aantal bloemen mee (geen 13!). Geef ze aan de moeder met de woorden "Acestea sunt pentru dumneavoastrƒÉ" (Deze zijn voor u).
</CultureTip>

## Afscheid Nemen

<VocabCard
  word="Mi-a fƒÉcut mare plƒÉcere sƒÉ vƒÉ cunosc"
  translation="Het was me een groot genoegen u te leren kennen"
  pronunciation="mee-a f…ô-KOOT MA-reh pl…ô-CHEH-reh s…ô v…ô koo-NOSK"
  example="Mi-a fƒÉcut mare plƒÉcere sƒÉ vƒÉ cunosc."
/>

<VocabCard
  word="VƒÉ mul»õumesc mult pentru ospitalitate"
  translation="Hartelijk dank voor de gastvrijheid"
  pronunciation="v…ô mool-tsoo-MESK moolt PEN-troo os-pee-ta-lee-TA-teh"
  example="VƒÉ mul»õumesc mult pentru ospitalitate. A fost minunat!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Sper sƒÉ ne revedem cur√¢nd"
  translation="Ik hoop dat we elkaar snel weer zien"
  pronunciation="sper s…ô neh reh-veh-DEM koo-R∆óND"
  example="Sper sƒÉ ne revedem cur√¢nd. Poate √Æn Olanda?"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="La revedere »ôi mul»õumesc pentru tot"
  translation="Tot ziens en bedankt voor alles"
  pronunciation="la reh-veh-DEH-reh shee mool-tsoo-MESK PEN-troo tot"
  example="La revedere »ôi mul»õumesc pentru tot!"
/>


## Do's en Don'ts

### Do's
- Gebruik "dumneavoastrƒÉ" bij de ouders
- Accepteer eten en drinken (vooral »õuicƒÉ!)
- Complimenteer de kookkunst
- Toon interesse in de familie
- Breng bloemen of een cadeau mee

### Don'ts
- Eten of drinken weigeren
- Te informeel zijn bij eerste ontmoeting
- Politiek bespreken (vooral gevoelige onderwerpen)
- Je telefoon constant checken
- Haast hebben om weg te gaan

<CultureTip title="Ospitalitate" flag="üíï">
Roemeense gastvrijheid (ospitalitate) is legendarisch! Verwacht veel eten, warmte en oprechte interesse in jou.
</CultureTip>

## Snelle Referentiekaart

| Situatie | Zin |
|----------|-----|
| Begroeting | BunƒÉ ziua, √Æmi pare bine sƒÉ vƒÉ cunosc! |
| Voorstellen | ...mƒÉ numesc, sunt prietenul/prietena lui/ei [Partner] |
| Compliment huis | Ave»õi o casƒÉ frumoasƒÉ |
| Compliment eten | Este foarte gustos |
| Hulp aanbieden | Pot sƒÉ vƒÉ ajut cu ceva? |
| Bedanken | VƒÉ mul»õumesc mult pentru tot |
| Afscheid | La revedere, mi-a fƒÉcut mare plƒÉcere |

<CTA
  text="Wil je nog beter voorbereid zijn op de schoonfamilie?"
  buttonText="Leer Meer Roemeens voor Familie-situaties"
/>

articles.title: Frases para Conhecer os Sogros em H√∫ngaro: Guia Completo
articles.content:
Conhecer os sogros h√∫ngaros √© experimentar hospitalidade calorosa. Os h√∫ngaros s√£o expressivos e valorizam fam√≠lia.

## Frases para o Primeiro Encontro

### Apresenta√ß√£o

**Nagy √∂r√∂m v√©gre megismerkedni √∂n√∂kkel.**
*√â uma grande alegria finalmente conhec√™-los.*

**[Nome] annyit mes√©lt √∂n√∂kr≈ël.**
*[Nome] me contou tanto sobre voc√™s.*

**Nagyon k√∂sz√∂n√∂m a megh√≠v√°st.**
*Muito obrigado(a) pelo convite.*

### Elogiando

**Gy√∂ny√∂r≈± otthonuk van.**
*Voc√™s t√™m uma casa linda.*

**Az √©tel nagyon finom.**
*A comida est√° muito gostosa.*

**Most m√°r √©rtem, kit≈ël √∂r√∂k√∂lte [nome] a [qualidade]-t.**
*Agora entendo de quem [nome] herdou [qualidade].*

**K√∂sz√∂n√∂m, hogy ilyen csod√°latos embert neveltek.**
*Obrigado(a) por criarem uma pessoa t√£o maravilhosa.*

### Mostrando Interesse

**Szeretn√©k t√∂bbet megtudni a csal√°di hagyom√°nyokr√≥l.**
*Gostaria de saber mais sobre as tradi√ß√µes da fam√≠lia.*

**Hogyan ismerkedtek meg?**
*Como voc√™s se conheceram?*

**Milyen volt [nome] gyerekk√©nt?**
*Como era [nome] quando crian√ßa?*

### Expressando Gratid√£o

**K√∂sz√∂n√∂m, hogy ilyen sz√≠v√©lyesen fogadnak.**
*Obrigado(a) por me receberem t√£o calorosamente.*

**Nagyon √©rt√©kelem a vend√©gszeretet√ºket.**
*Agrade√ßo muito a hospitalidade de voc√™s.*

## Oferecendo Ajuda

**Seg√≠thetek valamiben?**
*Posso ajudar em algo?*

## Despedindo-se

**K√∂sz√∂n√∂m a csod√°latos id≈ët.**
*Obrigado(a) pelo tempo maravilhoso.*

**Rem√©lem, hamarosan tal√°lkozunk.**
*Espero nos ver em breve.*

## Dicas Culturais

- **Formalidade** - Use "√ñn" inicialmente
- **Comida** - A culin√°ria h√∫ngara √© rica
- **P√°linka** - Pode ser oferecida
- **Flores** - N√∫mero √≠mpar

A csal√°d a legfontosabb - a fam√≠lia √© o mais importante!

articles.title: Tysk Grammatikk for Nybegynnere: L√¶r Deg Kj√¶rlighetens Spr√•k sammen med Partneren Din
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import ConjugationTable from '@components/ConjugationTable.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

N√•r du l√¶rer tysk for kj√¶resten din, er grammatikk n√∏kkelen til √• uttrykke deg tydelig og riktig. Kanskje du vil si "jeg elsker deg" p√• riktig m√•te, eller fortelle svigerforeldrene dine om planene deres? Ved √• mestre disse grunnleggende grammatikkreglene kan du og partneren din kommunisere mer naturlig p√• tysk.

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Ich liebe dich"
  translation="Jeg elsker deg"
  pronunciation="ikh LEE-beh dikh"
  context="Den viktigste setningen p√• tysk - bruk den med din kj√¶re hver dag!"
/>

## Den Enkle Forklaringen: Tysk Grammatikk er Som Et Byggesett

Tenk p√• tysk grammatikk som IKEA-m√∏bler - alt har sin plass! Mens norsk har enklere b√∏yning, har tysk tre kj√∏nn (han, hun, det) og fire kasus. Men ikke bekymre deg - vi skal gj√∏re det enkelt og romantisk.

Den st√∏rste forskjellen? Tysk b√∏yer artikler og adjektiver etter kj√∏nn og kasus. Det h√∏res komplisert ut, men det blir naturlig n√•r du √∏ver med [kj√¶resten din](/learn/no/de/how-to-say-i-love-you-in-german/).

## De 5 Grunnleggende Reglene

### 1. Bestemte og Ubestemte Artikler

Tysk har tre kj√∏nn: **der** (maskulin), **die** (feminin), **das** (n√∏ytrum).

<VocabCard
  word="der Mann"
  translation="mannen"
  pronunciation="dehr mahn"
  example="Der Mann liebt die Frau."
/>

- **der** (dehr) - for maskuline ord: Mann, Vater, Freund
- **die** (dee) - for feminine ord: Frau, Mutter, Freundin
- **das** (dahs) - for n√∏ytrale ord: Kind, Haus, Auto

### 2. Verb B√∏ying - Present Tens

Verbet endres etter subjektet (jeg, du, han/hun, vi, dere, de):

<ConjugationTable
  verb="lieben"
  meaning="√• elske"
  conjugations={[
    { person: "Ich", polish: "liebe", english: "jeg elsker" },
    { person: "Du", polish: "liebst", english: "du elsker" },
    { person: "Er/Sie", polish: "liebt", english: "han/hun elsker" },
    { person: "Wir", polish: "lieben", english: "vi elsker" },
    { person: "Ihr", polish: "liebt", english: "dere elsker" },
    { person: "Sie", polish: "lieben", english: "de elsker" }
  ]}
/>

### 3. Setningsstruktur - Hovedsetninger

Tysk har **V2-regelen**: Verb p√• andre plass!

**Riktig:** Ich **komme** heute zu dir. (Jeg kommer til deg i dag)
**Feil:** Ich heute komme zu dir.

### 4. Setningsstruktur - Sp√∏rsm√•l

I sp√∏rsm√•l kommer verbet f√∏rst:

- **Kommst** du heute? (Kommer du i dag?)
- **Liebst** du mich? (Elsker du meg?)
- **Hast** du Zeit? (Har du tid?)

### 5. Preposisjoner og Kasus

Noen preposisjoner krever bestemt kasus:

- **Akkusativ**: f√ºr (for), durch (gjennom), gegen (mot)
- **Dativ**: mit (med), bei (hos), von (fra)
- **Begge**: an (p√•), auf (p√•), in (i)

## Romantiske Eksempler for Par

| Tysk | Norsk | Grammatikk-notat |
|------|-------|------------------|
| **Ich liebe** dich | Jeg elsker deg | Ich + verb uten ending |
| **Du bist** mein Ein und Alles | Du er mitt alt | Du + verb med -st ending |
| **Wir haben** unsere Zukunft | Vi har v√•r fremtid | Wir + verb i grunnform |
| **F√ºr dich** mache ich alles | For deg gj√∏r jeg alt | F√ºr + akkusativ |
| **Mit dir** bin ich gl√ºcklich | Med deg er jeg lykkelig | Mit + dativ |

<CultureTip flag="üá©üá™" title="Tysk Kj√¶rlighetstradisjon">
Tyskere er ofte mer reserverte med offentlige kj√¶rlighetserkl√¶ringer enn nordmenn. "Ich liebe dich" er spesielt og brukes mindre ofte enn p√• norsk. Lag en spesiell stemning n√•r du sier det!
</CultureTip>

## Vanlige M√∏nstre i Hverdagen

### Tidspunkt og Avtaler

- **Um wie viel Uhr?** (Klokken hvor mange?)
- **Ich habe Zeit** (Jeg har tid)
- **Treffen wir uns** (M√∏tes vi?)

### F√∏lelser og Tanker

<VocabCard
  word="Ich denke an dich"
  translation="Jeg tenker p√• deg"

## Vanlige Feil (og Hvordan Unng√• Dem)
